about.me: Finance & Economics professional with a passion for Blockchain tech. and Social Entrepreneurship
about.server: We maintain a set of cloud-based systems with high reliability to assure a close to a 24/7/365 up-time of our servers.
about.company: Our Mission is sharing, as we thrive to provide optimal rewards to our delegators, we are giving away to charity and we share knowledge around the Cardano blockchain ecosystem.
